metadata.title: CVE-2023-6039 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in lan78xx_disconnect indrivers/net/usb/lan78xx.c in the network sub-component, net/usb/lan78xx inthe Linux Kernel. This flaw allows a local attacker to crash the systemwhen the LAN78XX USB device detaches.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
